Title: Mach Girl
Description: ['A spin-off of Mach Go Go Go (aka: Speed Racer). The titular Mach Girl is, according to Anime News Network, "a girl named Lip who wanders the land to compete in high-stakes races with her Mach Pink three-wheeler."']
Related: ['Parent story: Magical★Taruruuto-kun', 'Prequel: Magical★Taruruuto-kun Movie', 'Sequel: Magical★Taruruuto-kun: Sukisuki Takoyaki!']
